title: remember when riot buffed jinx
body:
and they gave her all of her lategame q stats at level one?

did they ever give any compensation nerfs for making another lategame hypercarry a super lane bully as well?

replies.body:
ya, they renerfed her Q and made her early game extra trash, BUT if she made it to the lategame, she wouldn't be matched by any other.


hence why her playrate went down, a game where everything is depicted in around 20 mins is not for her
cool. I wasn't paying super attention to the patch notes
